content.question: A decrease in the cost of land devoted for building townhouses will most likely cause which of the following?

choices.label: The supply curve of townhouses will shift to the left.
The demand curve for townhouses will become more elastic.
The price of townhouses will increase.
The supply of townhouses will increase.
There will be less incentive to build townhouses.

content.answer: The supply of townhouses will increase.

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
